concept.title: Hide a Node
concept.shortdesc: The Hide function removes nodes from the visualization.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

conbody.p: Once removed, Hidden nodes will be no longer appear in either the central Graph, Shelf or Discard bin.

p.note: Hidden nodes are not permanently deleted from the dataset and can be Retrieved using the Commands Tab.
Unlike most other Verbs, this function cannot be executed directly in the Graph. To Hide nodes, the user must execute the Verb in the Commands Tab.
